vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαραχίας, -ου, ὁ (Heb. בֶּרֶכְיָה),
Barachiah: Mat.23:35, see: Ζαχαρίας.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.11.4; married to Jehosheba (H3089);
father of: Zechariah (H2148w); also called Barachiah (KJV: Barachias; NIV: Berekiah) at Mat.23.35;
§ Berekiah, "Yahweh blesses"
Barachias, (Proper name), Mt. 23:35
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴拉加 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華祝福"
在聖殿被弒的撒迦利亞的父親 (太 23:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴拉加 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华祝福"
在圣殿被弑的撒迦利亚的父亲 (太 23:35)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-ra-chi « Đức Giê-hô-va ban phước ». Cha của tiên tri Xa-cha-ri, là tiên tri bị giết ở giữa khoảng đền thờ và bàn thờ. Xem H1296.
